info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Creates a bit measure from a binary measure. It sets a bit to 0 if the measure is 0, otherwise it sets the bit to 1.
[Parameters] - input data type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure.
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] Import measure as a bit-measure. oph_bit_import('OPH_DOUBLE', '', measure)
